law.catch_line: The Department may make a child care special loan to an applicant if:...
law.text:
The Department may make a child care special loan to an applicant if:
the applicant meets the qualifications required by this part;
the applicant meets any additional requirements imposed by the source of the money to be loaned; and
the child care special loan will be used for an authorized use under § 5-348 of this subtitle.
